subject: Order
description_text:
Hello.
Still no update on my pedals? I chose express delivery but still only one package has left the warehouse. And that one is still in China..

ssn6013

//Robert

conversations.body_text: Hi Robert Rasch,    I apologize for the delayed response. Here is your shipping tracking link. This product has been out of stock for nearly two weeksâ€”it's simply too popular. We'll ship it out to you within the next couple of days. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused.   https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047238966393

Is that the tracking link for the pedals? Looks like only the vam pro?

/Robert

Fri, 16 Jan 2026 at 10:31, support@simsonn.com wrote:

Hi Robert Rasch,  Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible.
